mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_CODE FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_CODE FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT c.*, m.MEMBER_NAME FROM "COMMENT" c JOIN "MEMBER" m ON c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
